reporting-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania

title.narrative: Assistance to Moldova in Implementation of Legal Reform Strategy: Bailiff Service Quality Improvement and Service Development

description.narrative: During the Project activities the best Lithuania and other European Union countries judicial officer's service practice will be used in purpose to improve quality of the judicial officer's activities in Moldova. Judicial Officer's activities will be implemented with ethical standards, focusing on the development if independent, high quality, efficient operating judicial officer's service and ensuring the wider accessibility for both residents and businesses in Moldova. The analysis of the Republic of Moldova existing laws regarding judicial officers services (especially the statement of facts) will be presented,summarizing the findings of the current legal regulation (strengths,weaknesses) and developed a practical guide (hand-book) for the judicial officer's of Moldova and their assistants. The Project aims to ensure the right to a person (the judicial officer's clients) privacy and data protection.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania
